system.description:
Transforms a creature into a different beast form. The target gains the beast's statistics but retains its personality. When reduced to 0 HP, reverts to original form.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can transform into more powerful beasts. At dice count 6, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 9, can polymorph into magical beasts. At dice count 12, transformations last longer. At dice count 15, can permanently transform creatures.
